backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, products, and orders with access control and Stripe integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, light/dark themes, and base UI variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including meta tags, favicon, and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, main layout, and pages including admin and checkout flows.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard enforcing authentication and admin permissions with corresponding UI states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for entering and saving a user's name and optional email using saveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Checkou: Button that triggers checkout by creating a Stripe session, handling auth, cart validation, and errors.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Main store layout with header, auth controls, cart indicator, and optional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/States.tsx: Reusable UI components for loading states, empty states, and product skeleton placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Mutation hooks for creating, updating, and archiving products via the actor, invalidating product queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Mutation hook that requests a checkout session from the backend and parses the returned Stripe URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity auth, exposing identity, login, logout, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Query hooks for fetching all products or a single product through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching, saving, and checking admin status of the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base definitions and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and archiving products using dialogs and product hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item controls, quantity updates, removal, total display, and a checkout button, plus an empty state when no items exist.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero section, product categories, and a list of featured active products, linking to product browsing and the cart.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation message with options to return to the cart or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart after payment success, shows confirmation details, and optionally displays the payment session ID.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Loads and displays detailed product info, availability, and quantity selection, allowing users to add items to the cart if in stock.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListPage.tsx: Lists all active products with search, brand, and category filters, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with persistence, quantity updates, removal, and total calculation.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting prices in currency and timestamps into readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and including typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, image assets, and architectural notes for the e-commerce app.
